Anger is a sign of weakness, not strength. The stronger person is the one who can control his emotions and respond calmly.
Anger is like a fire that burns everything in its path. It hurts you more than anyone else. You can choose to put out the fire or let it consume you.
Anger is a poison that you drink and expect the other person to die. It only harms you and your relationships. You can choose to let go of the poison and heal yourself.

Anger is a habit that can be changed. You can learn to replace it with more positive and constructive emotions. You can start by identifying what triggers your anger and how you can cope with it in a healthy way.
